summary: Implements an asynchronous web application that demonstrates Megatron's retrieval‑augmented generation (Retro) capabilities. The app manages document ingestion, model weight configuration, index resetting, and orchestrates the generation workflow, exposing these features through an interactive UI.
business_intent: Offer an interactive showcase for developers and stakeholders to evaluate and experiment with retrieval‑augmented generation, simplifying testing, presentation, and adoption of the Retro model.
